_meanings:
{@--1@} Not nourished or fed,
lean, not fat.

{@--2@} Not loud or 
violent, soft, low (as sound).

{@--3@} (In
<ab>Rhet.</ab>) Not feeding or assisting (the
meaning), irrelevant ( 
{#muKyAnupakArin#}), regarded as one of the  
{%arthadoshas%} (faults of the sense or 
meaning); as in the instance given 

under <ls>S. D. 576</ls> {#vilokya vitate vyomni#}
{#viDuM muMca ruzaMpriye#}, the adjective {#vitata#} 
‘expanded,’ as applied, to the sky, does
not in any way help the cessation of
anger and is, therefore, irrelevant.
